name: Learning-python
tagline: This is my walk through Zed A. Shaw's online course "Learn Python the Hard Way".
body:
Coding is absolutely new to me - except for a bit of HTML/CSS. I picked Python more or less randomly. Mostly I'm interested in coding itself. 

If you've got any suggestions on further learning material or resources I'm happy to here from you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
